uk.co.silentsoftware.dispatcher
Class WorkProcessor

java.lang.Object
  uk.co.silentsoftware.dispatcher.WorkProcessor

public class WorkProcessor
extends java.lang.Object

Wrapper class for a work processing unit that contains conversion actioning methods (i.e. the bits that actually call the bits that do work :) ). This class is not entirely static due to the need for separate instances when used by the many dithers preview requiring a different image processor each time.
